alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Piscataquis and central Penobscot Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 339 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ebeemee, or 9 miles northwest of Brownville Junction, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Ebeemee, Lake View Plantation, Brownville, Maxfield, Seboeis, Ebeemee Lake, Cedar Lake, Katahdin Iron Works, West Seboeis, Norcross and Williamsburg. This includes State Highway 11 between West Seboeis and Norcross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis
